skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

skillTree.name: Eternal Bastion
skillTree.description: Strengthened by the ages and Kemmler's necromancy, Krell's Chaos-infused plate armour protects him from degrading as other bound-entities eventually must do.

effects.description: Krell's combat ability is greatly enhanced.
Upgrades ability: "Lord of Undeath"

ui_effects.description: Krell's combat power is greatly enhanced

skillTree.name: Perpetual Regeneration
skillTree.description: Life without end; destruction without pause. Excellent!

skillTree.description: "What greater prospect do I have in Nagash's service  a future of mindless servitude in an unchanging world? The Great Necromancer is a selfish child."

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

effects.description: Miscast base chance: -15%

skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

skillTree.name: Loremaster, Lore of Vampires

factionEffects.title: Lichemaster
factionEffects.description: Heinrich Kemmler burns with the need for power. Having recognised the limits that mortality placed upon him in his early years, Kemmler made it his life's work to escape them.

effects.description: Immune to Chaos Undivided corruption and Chaos Wastes attrition
